1.content: Ok, frist off where are you at?
1.title: where are you?

11.content: Waking up from a deep sleep you find yourself on a leaf in the water. But wait your 1 inch tall and this is not the ocean this is a swamp. You look around and you find a twig and grab in. You can go north, south, east, west or anywhere you want to go.
11.title: Where to go.

choices: try to use the frog to your advantage
111.content: You are going north and find that you are being watched closely by a frog, wishing to devour you for his dinner. he hops out on front of you, and sticks it tongue out at you. You realize he wants to eat you, so you jump from your twig back to the leaf. The frog pursues you in hope of eating you and digesting you quickly. You know you take on the frog by yourself, but you don't know where to go. You quickly jump down into the swamp water and hold your breath as long as you can, hoping the frog will just leave you alone. You can hold your breath for a very long time, but it really gets put to the test when the frog doesn't go away. You run out of breath and resurface. To your advantage the frog has turned around, and you have time to catch your breath. You wonder what has happened to you and why you are only one inch tall. At that moment, you set out on a journey to get back to your normal size before something either eats you or even kills you. Where do you from here?
111.title: Swamp Water

1113.content:
You decide to try use the frog to your advantage, and what better advantage could the frog provide than transportation. So you stick your head out of the water a bit to make sure the frog still has its back turned towards you. Then you leap out of the water and onto the frog's back. The frog isn't too happy about this and tries to shake you off by jumping wildly all over the place. You do your best to try and keep your grip on the frog, but it is difficult to do because of how slimey the frog's skin is. The two of are on land when the frog finally shakes you off. You go flying through the air and land on the ground with a hard thud. Dazed, you quickly sit up and see the frog stareing at you. It hadn't forgotten that it wanted to eat you, and you watch frozen in fear as the frog opens its moutn and shoots its long sticky tongue out at you. Then tongue hits you in the chest, and before you can do anything the tongue pulls you into the hungry frog's mouth.

Inside the mouth you become drenched from head to toe in the frog's sticky saliva. You struggle as much as you can, but you now it's in vain, you're done for now. You wonder why the frog hasn't swallowed you yet though. It was probably savoring your flavor as the tongue licked and wraped around you. The frog continues to savor your delicious flavor for several minutes. Then the throat muscles flex and you scream as, like a great many insects before, the frog easily swallows you whole. The muscles slowly massage you down the short esophagus and into the stomach, which opens up to accept you as food. Inside the cramped stomach you continue your futile struggles, but you barely move since the stomach is so cramped and you're drenched in the frog's sticky saliva. Eventually, you pass out from exhaustion just as the digestive jucies begin to flow.
1113.title: Frog Wrangleing

112.content:
You row your way down the South of the swamp and look around to see the trees were utterly huge. You do realize that you had been shrunken to an inch tall for some reason but the trees in the area were so big that they would make you look like you were an inch tall even if you were normal-sized. You then hear shaking and look up to see several dragonflies fly overhead. From the looks of it they were as big as aircraft carriers. You paddle ferociously as you see fish swimming under head and you definitely don't want to end up as a meal. But to your surprise, it isn't just fish that are swimming under the water but trilobites as well. "Trilobites?" you ask. "Those have been extinct for millions of years. "Just where am..."

Suddenly you gasp because you see a continent-sized skeleton of what looked like a plesiosaurus in the water and from the looks of it, it was fresh and had just finished rotting. That made you realize something. Not only were you shrunk to an inch tall in a swamp but you were shrunk to an inch tall in a swamp that seemed to be leftover from the prehistoric past. You were now visibly afraid because where there was one plesiosaurus corpse, there were likely to be actual dinosaurs nearby.

Your suspicions were about to be confirmed because you soon hear the sound of thunderous stomping and realize that there is in fact a dinosaur nearby and a rather inhumanly large one, even if you were only an inch tall. That's when you see the dinosaur that stops to take a drink of the swamp water and it's a...
112.title: South of the Primordial Swamp

choices: Yeah let's go with that one.
Nah, how does a Ornithomimus sound?
No lets just keep on going with the choices.
1123.title: More Options

11233.title: No lets just keep on going with the choices.

choices: Yes yes, lets go with that one.
No no no SMALLER than that.
112332.content: Okay, What about an animantarx?
112332.title: Perhaps a smaller dinosaur?

choices: Yes, lets go with THAT one.
1123322.title: No no no SMALLER than that.

choices: Well okay lets do that one.
Okay then what about some synapsids? (dimetrodon perhaps)
11233222.content: Then what about a compsognathus? There's no dinosaur (that i know of) that's smaller than a compsognathus.
11233222.title: NO, SMALLER!

choices: An otter pops up, wondering what you are
The mink glides over, interested in you
115.content:
You deside to just let the water take you werever it goes. You slowly drift about, watching the wildlife.

An opossum hung from a branch up ahead.

A raccoon waddled through the brush, a skunk drinking nearby.
A fawn napped, a porcupine gnawed on some bark, while a wolf pup played.
A family of otter's played in the water and on the bank, while beavers worked hard.

You remained on your guard, not knowing what might happen. For a while you watch a mink swim and a mouse look for food. A chipmunk and a red squirrel scampered through the trees, a pin martin watching them.

You watched them all warily, would gladly gulp you down. At that moment...
115.title: anywhere

1151.content:
One of the otters swam underwater, circling your legs. She licked her lips, this creature would make a great meal, and a nice squirmy bulge as well. You jumped when she popped up in front of you. She pinned your arms to your side and held your legs with her back paws before opening her maw. You gasp in terror, but couldn't do anything before she stuffed your head in. You gag at her fishy breath as her broad tongue ran over your face, taking in your taste. The otter rolled onto her back and gulped down your head and took in your chest. She purred at your taste, She would have eat more of these things once she got the chance. She gulped down your chest and took in your gut, playfully poking your belly with her teeth. You wriggle, trying to get free, but to no avail. The otter only purred at your taste. With a few more gulps, just your legs were left. She slurped up your legs and gave your feet a goodbye taste before gulping them down. The otter belched and rubbed her squirming belly. You kick and thrash, your limbs melting and vision fading.

A few minutes later, the otter swam to shore and ran behind a bush. She squatted down and emptied her bowls. She shook her plump ass at the pile of otter shit with a skull before heading back to the river.
1151.title: An otter pops up, wondering what you are

1152.content:
The mink swam up to you, sniffing at your form. She rested the urge to lick her lips, this creature was the perfect meal. It was big enough to make a nice squirmy bulge too. She grabbed you, pinning your arms to your sides. Before you could do anything, her maw opened and she stuffed your head in her gob. You kick, only for the mink to hold your legs still with her back feet. You gag at her fishy breath as she took in your taste. With a loud gulp, she took in your chest, purring with glee. She flooded on her back, gulping down your chest and taking in your belly. You groan as her tongue took in your taste. With a few gulps, just your legs were left. She swallowed your legs and gave your feet a goodbye taste. The Mink belched and rubbed her squirmy belly, her acids wasting no time gurgling you into ass fat. Your vision faded to black as you melted.

A few minutes later, the Mink swam onto the shore and scampered behind a bush. She squatted down and emptied her bowels. She smirked at the skull on the pile of mink shit before shaking her fat ass and heading back under the water.
1152.title: The mink glides over, interested in you

11531.content:
You drift to the shore, and you crawl ashore and fall asleep. The fawn walked up to your sleeping form and licked your feet, humming at your taste. She took in your feet, laying down as she did so. Her tongue lapped across your legs as she swallowed your legs like pasta. She took in your ass and hands, her tongue running across your flesh, and that's when you wake up. You gasp in terror, but can't do anything as she took in your gut, flipping you around to lap at your belly. She swallowed your belly and took in your chest. The fawn hummed with glee, and gulped down your chest, leaving just your head in her maw. You can only stare in terror as your line of sight was framed by her maw. The fawn snapped her jaws shut and started sucking on your head, taking in your taste. Finally, she swallowed you down and got up, smiling at her bulging belly. Inside, your limbs started to melt and your vision faded.

A few minutes later, the fawn walked behind a bush and squatted down, squeezing out your remains. She shook her plump ass at the skull topping the pile of shit before walking away.
11531.title: Fawn Fat

choices: find out what the noise is
12.content:
Portals are crazy things. It was once believed that they sent you to other demensions, but I know better.
Portals are shrinking devices. How do I know? It all started one day in my house. I was in the living room watching Kill Bill when I heard this weird noise....
12.title: Safe in your own home????

121.content: you get you to find out what the noise is. As you leave your living room you are knocked out by flashes of light. As you seem to awaken you see you have shrunk and you hear another noise. But this one sounds like one you hear a lot. Then you realize it's the sound of your pet...
121.title: the noise

choices: Go over to rover. He'll remember you.
Run. You're too small to risk it.
1211.content: You realize that the noise is the sound your black lab rover makes when he is asleep. You then hear thumps. Rover must be heading for the living room where you are. You feel weird, you know rover is your best friend. But he might mistake you for food at your size right now. So you...
1211.title: Here comes rover

12111.content: As Rover nters the living room you run over to him. You're positive he'll rember you. Afterall you're his best friend d you feed him everyday. As you approach Rover quickly notices and bends his head down to sniff you. Your nearly suked into Rover's nose as he sniffs you. Then he opens his mouth and brings out his tongue. Before you can do anything Rover's tongue sacks into you and licks you, thus covering you in saliva. Rover licks you over and over again. As you're being licked you laugh because of how much the tongue tickles. All the while you hope he is just bing friendly. Then Roverr...
12111.title: Licked

121111.content:
Suddenly, Rover stops licking you. As you slowly stop laughing you look up and see that Rover was looking at you in a way you don't like. He slowly licks his lips as he continues to stare at you. You gulp and slowly start to back away.

"Easy Rover. Nice doggy." You say nevously as you back away.Then without warning Rover lunges at you, and you scream as he quickly laps you up. You find yourself lying on Rover's massive tongue looking around in disbelieve. Saliva pours over you as you're blasted by Rover's hot smelly breath. Then he starts licking you against the roof of his mouthand rolling you around on his tongue. Rover savors your delicious flavor for several minutes. Suddenly, the tongue settles down and you scream as it starts pushing you towards the back of the throat. Then Rover tilts his head back and swallows you whole with a loud gulp. You feel as if you're going down a slimey waterslide as you slowly travel down the esophagus becoming drenched in even more saliva. As you travel down to your final destination you think about how you knew that Rover might nistake you for food, and it seems he did indeed mistake you for food. Eventually, your journey comes to an end andyou land in the stomach with a plop.

Inside the stomach you don't eve attempt to struggle. You just think about what a fool you were. As the digestive jucies begin to flow you willingly accept your fate. Fortunatly, you pass out from a lack of air just as you start to digest. In the end you were nothing but a foolish and tasty treat for your dog.
121111.title: Eats You

12112.content:
Your practically petrified with fear as the heavy footsteps of the enormous dog loom closer and closer. You can't help but let out a gasp as the huge beast turns the corner. It probably wouldn't have noticed you if you hadn't gasped..

The dog turns it's head in your direction, only to glare at you intently with deep hazel eyes, it's glossy saliva-coated tongue lolled out to the side, he looks hungry..

-You're suddenly filled with adrenalin, your only instinct is to run!!!

..But where to?
12112.title: Time to dash!

121121.content: You turn around and break into a dead run towards the cream colored sofa that you were just sitting on. At your size now, the once medium sized piece of furniture seemed to be as tall as a mountain. You hear the large footsteps of the lab getting closer and you begin to sprint faster towards your destination. A great shadow approaches and you know that Rover is right behind you. You dive, sliding across the wooden floor to safety..
121121.title: Quick! Under the sofa!

choices: Dash out when he isn't looking.
1211211.content:
You slide under the shadow of the couch and turn around to see a huge black paw slam down in the place you just were in. You hear the dog whine and see the front of his muzzle stick under the sofa. You back up a bit and then bump into something soft. Turning around you make out the silhouette of a large lump of dust in the darkness. You really should clean up more often...

You begin to make your way to the other side of the sofa, but you then begin to here more huge footsteps and the clatter of Rover's claws on the floor. It seems he was making his way around the sofa to where you were going. You stop in what you assume to be the center of the couch and plan out what you should do.
1211211.title: You make it!

12112112.content:
You decided to wait until Rover isn't looking and dash out from under the sofa. You prepare yourself and watch. You wait for what seems like several minutes, but then Rover finally looks in a different direction. Seizeing the opportunity you make a mad dash out from under the middle of the sofa. Unfortunately, Rover looks back your way as you make it out and sees you. You hear him coming after you and quicken your pace. However, Rover easily catches up to you and snatchs you up in his jaws. He then proceeds to toss you high up into the air. You sore up above the sofa and then start to fall back down. You look down to see to Rover's open maw waiting for you. You scream in terror and try to fall away from his mouth. Unfortunately, you inevitably land with a plop onto Rover's tongue, and he closes his mouth sealing you in.

You find yourself lying on Rover's massive tongue in the dark. You become drenched in saliva as his foul smelling breath washes over you. Then he starts to lick you against the roof of his mouth and rolling you around on his tongue. Rover savors your delicious flavor for several minutes. Eventually, the tongue settles down and you scream in terror once more as it starts pushing you to the back of the throat. Then Rover tilts his head back and swallows you whole with a loud gulp. You slowly travel down the esophagus. It almost feels like a slimey waterslide as you become drenched in even more saliva. Eventually, your journey comes to an end and you land in the stomach with a plop. You just sit there, too petriffied with fear to even struggle. You've just been eaten by your dog. You never thought that you would die because Rover thought you were food. Before long the digestive jucies begin to flow. You scream in pain as they start to eat away at you, but you pass out from the pain before being completely digested. In the end you were nothing more than food for Rover.
12112112.title: Dash 'n Dine

1211212.content:
As you're sliding across the floor you think you're going to make it. Then suddenly you slide right into Rover's massive paw. Sitting up you look to see him stareing right at you. He had been much faster than you were expecting. Then Rover licks his lips and you gulp at the sight. You try to back away quickly, but he picks you up with his mouth before you can get very far. Your legs kick in the air as you try in vain to escape. Then Rover tilts his head back and opens his mouth just long enough for you to slide all the way in.

You now find yourself completely inside Rover's mouth and lying on his massive tongue. Saliva pours over you as you're constantly bombarded by his foul smelling breath. Then he starts to lick you against the roof of his mouth and roll you around on his tongue. Rover savors your delicious flavor for quite some time. Eventually the tongue settles down and you scream in terror as it starts to push you towards the back of the throat. Then Rover tilts his head back agian and swallows you whole with a loud gulp. You slowly travel down the esophagus and become drenched in even more saliva. Eventually your journey comes to an end and you land in the stomach with a plop. You begin to struggle and beg Rover to let you out, but it's all in vain. It doesn't take long for the digest jucies to start flowing. Luckly, you pass out from exhaustion and a lack of air just as the digestive jucies start to go to work on you.
1211212.title: Blocked and Food.

choices: Go to luna. She'll know it's you.
Run. You know what she does with mice.
1212.content: You realize that sound is the sound your black cat luna makes when she is asleep. Suddenly you hear thumps. Luna must be come over to the living room. You know luna will know it you, you feed her everyday. But you remember what she does with the mice she finds. So you...
1212.title: Luna is here

12121.content:
You walk towards Luna, confident that she'll recognise her owner.

She notices you immediately, but she doesn't seem happy. She hisses at the strange little creature approaching her. She meows, revealing the pink cavernous inside of her mouth, which you see differently now that you know you could fit easily inside it!

Luna...
12121.title: Kitty surprise

choices: Grab a tiny toy sword and hack at her now giant paws
121212.content: You cry, "Ack!" and leap away, trying to outrun a giant cat that apparently thinks you're an appetizing snack and you think that she has gone nuts and that her brain has finally snapped. Come on, you feed her EVERY DAY! She should realize that it's you. Unfortunately she has had a grudge against you because when you and Luna were little, you would hug her VERY TIGHTLY. So, this time, she will bite you VERY TIGHTLY. Now what? You think, now running on adrenaline. You...
121212.title: Runs toward you

1212121.content: You turn to face Luna. Big mistake. Luna takes you into her mouth and plays her tounge all over you. She savors your flavor before swallowing you whole. You're squeezed down the fleshy tube of Luna's esaphogous for a good while. You are gently deposited in Luna's stomach. Luckly you pass out before the digestive acids start to flow. You were the best meal Luna ever had.
1212121.title: lunch

1212122.content:
As you run from Luna you spot a little sword from an old pirate toy of yours. Suddenly you get an idea and change direction heading towards the sword. There was no way Luna was going to eat you with out a fight. You grab the sword just as Luna is about to catch up with you. Then you let out your best battle cry and dash towards Luna who stops in her tracks. You swing your sword wildly at Luna's paw as hard as you can. However, because of your diminished size and strength Luna bearly feels your blows, and it isn't long before she knocks the sword out of your hands and you find yourself in Luna's mouth.
         You find yourself laying flat on your stomach on Luna's tongue. You're blasted with Luna's fowl smelling breath as you become drenched in saliva. Luna rolls you around on her tongue and licks you against the roof of her mouth. She spends several minutes savoing your delicouse flavor. Suddenly Luna's tongue starts pushing you towards the back of her throat, and then she tilts her head back and swallows you whole with a loud gulp. As you slowly travel down the esophagus you are filled with dread knowing that this the last day you'll feed your cat and that you're what she ate. Eventually you land in the stomach with a plop. You struggle valiantly to try and get out, but it is all in vain. You lose concinsnes just as the stomach acids began to flow. Meanwhile, Luna lies down to take a nap while she digested you. As she fell asleep she couldn't help but keep thinking about just much more wonderful you tasted then all the mice she had eaten. It seems that revenge really is sweet.
1212122.title: Futile Attack

122.content:
Noises are disturbing, but you are too lazy to get up, so you decided it would be nice to just simply hide in the blankets. However, the sound become louder and louder. And eventually, you fell asleep.

After waking up, you notice that you are still on the sofa, but everything seemed much bigger. Than, you heard a sound, what is it?
122.title: Hiding in your blankets

choices: Try to find help from Luna
1221.content:
On the sofa, you saw your cat, Luna, waking up. She had really soft black fur, which is the main reason that you brought her. She started coming near the sofa, not noticing you.

Would trying to get help from your cat be a good idea? You remember that the last time you feed her was yesterday, so she's probably hungry for food. You never really saw Luna catch a mouse before, so she probably wouldn't hurt you. But still, since Luna is a cat, it's probably best to run, or hide under the blankets, it might turn you back into your own size!
1221.title: It's Luna, your cat

choices: Go to your bedroom, check out your pet Rabbit
Go to the kitchen, you felt hungry.
12213.content:
You hide under the blankets, from the sound you hear, the cat should have gone out of the house. She always liked to go out and have some adventure.

You continued and waited for a while, but look like the blanket can't turn you back into your own size. So you went down the sofa and decided to start Explore.

So, where to?
12213.title: Hide under the blankets

choices: No time to find out,, RUN!!
13.content:
"Hmmm.. Uhh.." you begin to wake "Wh-wh-where am I?" you carefully ease yourself into a sitting posistion, rubbing your weary eyes - your body is covered in bruises, yet you do not recall what happened to you..

You wince, grabbing onto a car-sized leaf for support.

"WHAT THE!?!" you give an alarmed shriek, letting go of the giant leaf in surprise as your worried eyes dart quickly about your surroundings.

"No no.. This can't be for real.." you groan to yourself. You were in the centre of a forest, only everything here was huge.. Had you shrunk...?

Small plants tower above you, insects nearby are the size of dogs! ..But surely there are bigger creatures nearby?

Your question is soon answered as ground begins to shake.. Somethings approaching!!!
13.title: ...Alone in the giant forest

131.content:
Looking up over the leaf that your hiding under, you see a huge python, bigger than youve ever seen! Its massive body is the width of a lorry, and its at least a mile long (from your point of veiw)

It slivers towards your hiding place, smelling the air with its tongue. You duck under the leaf, praying it wont see you.

It comes closer, weaving its way through the undergrowth, coming straight at you.

But it hasnt seen/smelt you. From under the leaf, you see the slithering body get closer and closer until, it goes over the leaf your under.

Knowing you will be crushed under the immense weight, you desperatly cling to the pythons tree-trunk body. Hugging it, you notice how smooth and soft it is, not at all like people think a snake feels like.

The python hasnt noticed that your clinging to it, and continues on.

You glance down, then wish you didnt.

The ground looks like its being sucked under the body of the snake, and everything is being crushed.

You start to sweat. This makes you even more nervous. Not only might it make you slip, but it might alert the snake to your presence.
131.title: Snake!

choices: Go for a quick swim.. It can't hurt..
Theres bound to be big fish in here, get out!
1311.content:
As the enormous snake picks up the pace you begin to find it difficult to cling on.

Although the python was traveling at an average speed - to you it seemed like a giant roller coaster!

You squirm as you try to get a firmer grip on the snakes smooth scales.. Carefully you raise your left leg, trying in vain to ease it over the snakes titanic tail into a sitting position.

You succeed, the shear effort almost tiring you out.

Suddenly, the snake darts off to the side, you are helplessly flung off. You suck in your breath, closing your eyes as you prepare to hit solid ground.

To your surprise, you land with a splash in a lake. You gasp for air, swimming quickly to the surface..

Now what..?
1311.title: Flung into the lake..

choices: The mouth closes, and you cant get out. Explore?
13111.content:
You decide to swim. What could happen.

You swim along, enjoying the feeling of the cool water. You start doing backstroke, and close your eyes, carving through the water at considerable speed.

You carry on with this for a while, and decide that you had btter get out of the water.

You open your eyes, and your suprised to see darkness. It had been the middle of the day when you fell into the water. Why is it dark?

You crane your head forwards, and see sunlight beyond a wall of teeth.

You had seen something like this on a documentary. It looks like a crocodiles mouth.

What the hell is a crocodile doing here!? you think.
It must of been basking with its mouth open, and you swam right into it.
13111.title: Swimming

131111.content: You escapev but are attacked by a........
131111.title: out of the croc and into the..,...................

1311111.content: Ever heard of "collective group activity"? You know, the idea that a big fish owns the pond until all the little fish gang up on it, with it as a common enemy, and beat it? Well, this is a bit like that, only without all the little fish to beat up the massive, hulking bass that abruptly catches you in its mouth and swallows you almost immediately. Within seconds, you find yourself surrounded by darkness as you are trapped in the massive fish's belly. Unfortunately, you can't really do much of anything inside it, your struggles prove futile, and you eventually find yourself getting quite faint. The heartbeat of the fish grows more and more silent, as do its stomach groans. You eventually pass out just before the stomach acids consume you and end your life.
1311111.title: fish

1311112.content: A giant frog hops out of no where and shoots its tongue out towards you. It hits you and draws you back into it mouth. The tongue is sticky and gooey with mucus. The mouth is cramped and you cannot even move. The frog swallows and you get squeezed into the tiny belly. What happens to you?
1311112.title: frog / swallowed alive

13111121.content: You kick and fight and cry for help but it's no good, the frog's stomach growls 1 more time and then everything goes dark, you have been digested and killed
13111121.title: You get digested

choices: The frog is eaten by the croc from before
13111122.content: Luckily the frog somehow can't digest you. You're immune to the acids. But you still don't want to be in this big belly so you need some way to get out. You jump around and pound all over the stomach walls in hopes that the frog will spit you back out. What happens next.
13111122.title: You survive

1311112211.content: All your movement in the stomach seems to upset the frog. It tries jumping and hopping around to get you to stop, but it doesn't work. The more you moved around the more sick feeling the frog felt. The frog decides that you are not worth the trouble, so it decided to spit you back out. You feel the liquids in the stomach rise up around you, as your catapulted back up it's throat, and out of its mouth. With a splat you land on the ground covered in slime. Getting up onto your hands and knees you watch as the Frog leaps back into the water. Slowly standing up you try to wipe off the slime. Looking around you are surrounded by tall grass, dirt, and rocks about the size of a two-story building. You decide to walk among the grass do you keep from being seen. Walking along you reminisce all what you experience today. You shrunk down, encountered a giant snake, were almost eaten by a crocodile,and actually swallowed by a frog. You were so caught up in your own thoughts, you hadn't noticed that even though you were walking through the grass is to hide, you had caught the attention of something. It slowly watched you and studied you to see what you are. Quietly sneaking up behind you it waited for just the right moment to strike. You were brought out of your thoughts when a huge shadow appeared above you. Turning around and looking up you see it's a...
1311112211.title: On land

131111221131.content: Your face to giant face with a gecko. It’s beady eyes are focused on you and every movement you make. You try and slowly back away, but that caused the gecko to skitter closer faster then you could move. Before you knew what happened your flying towards it’s open mouth wrapped tightly in its tongue. Darkness greeted you as the gecko’s mouth closes and your tossed around as it tastes you. The sticky saliva makes it difficult to move around on your own, as your pushed around by it tongue and sucked on a few times. After what seems like for ever the gecko...
131111221131.title: A gecko

131111221132.content:
You turn and look up. You see a massive red baby velociraptor staring down at you, head cocked to one side. It look like a 12 story tall building to you. You back up a little as it lowers it’s huge head down to look at you. It sniffs you a bit and flicks it’s tongue out to taste you a bit, covering you in raptor saliva. What does it do next?

Option 1:
It nuzzles you gently and uses it’s tongue to flick you up onto it’s muzzle. (Friendly)

Option 2:
It quickly wraps it’s tongue around you and pull you into it’s mouth. (Hungry)
131111221132.title: A baby raptor

It doesn't take long for you to float in the stomach. It's so dark that you can't even see your hand in front of your face and the smell of half-digested seaweed fills the air. The raft of seaweed you're standing on begins to break down and you fall into the stomach juice. However, for some reason, you aren't digested. Probably has to do with the fact that manatees are mostly herbivores.

At that moment a large belch fills the air and you are reminded of your horrifying predicament. Swallowed whole by a manatee because you had the misfortune to fall into her lunch. This aquatic giantess probably didn't even know that she had an inch high human in her stomach.

You don't have a chance. Within a heartbeat, the snake lunges its mouth towards you, clamps down on your shoulder, and pulls you towards it. You are thrust into the centre of its mass of thick coils. Wrapped up in snake, with your feet towards the ground, your arms pinned to your sides and your head staring into its eyes, it begins the big squeeze.

The massive coils tighten around you, your legs bind together, your arms squash into your flanks, and your chest has all the air inside forced out. For what seems like hours, the snake holds you in its deadly embrace, watching your face turn red as you try to force air into your constricted lungs.

The inside of the snake is coated with a thick saliva which reeks of the previous occupant.

The snake swallows its way down to your groin. It releases its heavy coils as it goes, revealing your naked and bruised skin. You are in no shape to fight. Exhausted from the constriction, and with you arms tightly pinned inside the snake throat, all you can do is breathe the disgusting air.

Your body suddenly lurches upwards as the snake reaches your legs. Rather then working its way down, it has lifted it head up to allow gravity to assist. You try to push against the muscular walls, but each time the snake just contracts, squeezing you tightly in place. A much thicker fluid starts to ooze over you, and you skin starts to burn. The snake returns to its coiled position to sleep and properly digest its meal. From the outside, you are nothing by a bulge within the snakes body. It won't take long to break you down and digest you. There is no escape.

You step back as the crocodile lowers its head and you see that the crocodile giant is female. You don't know how you know that, but you're looking at a girl croc the size of a city. The croc looks down on you and snorts more hot wind on you before she lets out a moan and you can swear the croc is smiling at you.

The croc lets open her mouth wide and bellows, releasing a stream of saliva that leaks down at high speed and then hits the ground with a splash. You try to run, but some of the crocodile drool splashes on you and makes you slip and scream as you slide through the sea of drool until you touch the crocodile on her nose.

You're frozen in fear as the crocodile gives a sly smile. She's having fun with you, you can see it in her eyes.

Then suddenly, the giant crocodile opens her mouth to...
1421221112.title: Big Momma Croc

14212211122.content:
The enormous crocodile opens her mouth and then looks down on you as she roars. You realize that she intends to eat you. You scream and run but you're so tiny that the crocodile has only to walk slowly towards you as she holds out her mouth, hungry for some meat. She drools heavily and you slip on the crocodile's saliva and then try to swim through it but the spit is too thick and you slide towards the greedy awaiting mouth that leads to certain doom. You scream and try to grab the edge of the crocodile's mouth, but she lets out a bellow as if to laugh at your futile struggle just as she tilts her head up and up. You start to slip and you scream as the crocodile slams her mouth shut and gives a gulp. You slide down her throat and the crocodile swallows you. She drools heavily and lets out a bellow before she swims under the water.

The next thing that you know, you're in a dark place with squishy walls. However, from what little you can see, you don't know if you really are in the crocodile queen's stomach. There is some slight room to move around though. Where exactly are you inside the crocodile?
14212211122.title: Mama's Hungry

choices: She makes soft noises that sound like the crocodile equivalent off cooing.

But strangely you are not being digested, heck, there are no liquids inside of her stomach at all. It seems like the giant croc didn’t really need you for food after all. You reason that you are safe in there as long as the croc doesn’t forget about you and eats something else as well. You try to calm yourself down by saying that the fact that you are not being digested is a good thing and that there’s nothing to worry about but it’s not working. You start to have a panic attack and lay down in the middle of her stomach, breathing heavily. But then the crocodile queen does something to try and comfort you. What does she do?

Your not sure how but it better then being digested.

A huge shadow block out the light and it gets darker and warmer. The momma croc must be over her eggs. You begin to grow sleepy when a booming voice surrounds you. “You are one lucky human. You get the chance to be born from one of my eggs instead of digested as food like the others I’ve found.” The voice is strong yet feminine so you guess it’s the croc talking to you. “Why am I in your egg?” You ask her. “I decided I want a human pet and playmate for my hatchlings. This way your scent will tell others you belong to me. But make no mistake I Or my mate will eat you if you anger me.” She said in a stern tone.

14311111.content:
The rabbit keeps its paw on you, pushing you down as you finally give up struggling. You're not done fighting yet, though--you're waiting for the rabbit to give you an opening, then you'll see what you can do to get away from it. It's not trying to eat you, but it's hurting you a bit with its playing, and that's not a good thing.

Suddenly, the rabbit removes its paw from you. You look up at it in surprise, only to see its face coming closer and closer, and it's tongue slips from its mouth to give you a quick, little lick. Your face is covered in a thin layer of drool, which you quickly wipe off with your arm, and you stare up at the rabbit in surprise. It's a vegetarian, so did it just lick you to be friendly... Or is it actually planning to eat you?
14311111.title: The bunny decides to have a taste

143111111.content:
Unfortunately your guess was not on the mark as the rabbit parts his maw wide, and leaning in - he was gonna devour you right there! And though you'd try to wiggle out of its grip and get away, its paws held you as the rabbit's tongue slurped out and curled around you, drawing you inside the hot, squishy lapine maw, after which the jaws close, sealing you in hot fleshy darkness, why it decided to take a liking to eating you you'd never know..

The rabbit, after sealing you in its mouth, starts rolling and swishing you around, slurping, nibbling and mushing you against the slimy flesh of its tongue, the roof of its maw, and even against its flat herbivorous teeth. all the while making you grunt, struggle and groan from the pressure and the constant licking, coating you thicker in its slightly smelly saliva.

Eventually you'd be flopped on the rabbit's tongue, turned and facing the throat.. and then you'd feel the mouth tilt up and back, sending you cascading to its throat. And while you try to grab onto something, ANYTHING to prevent you from falling into that yawning passage, the tongue and teeth were far too slimy to get a grip on, and with a wet, lurching GULP you were sent into the bunny's gullet.

Squished and kneaded on by all sides of the slimy, fleshy passage, you'd groan at the smell rising from the lapine's gut up ahead, the scent of digesting herbs and vegetables, until you'd come to a bump, soon squelching wetly through the sphincter into the gurgling, groaning stomach of the rabbit. You'd be dunked into a pool of very warm, bubbling slimes, sputtering and coughing a bit at the unpleasant taste and smell. Now trapped in the gut of an herbivore, you could only hope its belly wouldn't be able to do anything to you..

Soon enough you'd know the outcome as..

She stares at you again, this time more pity in it than care. "I'm guessing you'll need protection here...you're already covered in the alpha male's saliva." She picks you up by the collar of your shirt using her teeth, trotting towards her den. "My cubs died at a young age, so you'll be the closest thing to one! I hope you don't mind being my pet?"

143222121222.content:
The lion licks his lips. The truth is that you taste far better than the meat the zoo keepers give them every day. He look at his bloated stomach and smiles a little (or, at least, it looks like a smile). It had been a long time since he had eaten something that had filled his hungry stomach so much and, of course, even if you had not been a match for him, it was the first time since he was taken to the zoo that he had managed to "hunt" a living prey. Normally, he would have torn you to pieces with his sharp teeth and devoured your guts, but you're the first prey he had seen in years. He don’t want to share you.

You settle in his soft stomach and think.You are an inch tall and you have been swallowed alive by a lion. And for some strange reason, its gastric juices don't affect you. Look on the bright side: his belly is quite comfortable and you will also have food and water that will be provided by the same lion. Of course it would only be water and raw meat, chewed and full of saliva, but it is always healthier than McDonald's burgers, right?. Besides... here you will be very safe. After all, is a lion! Who would mess with him?

Even if, on second thought, being trapped in the stomach of a predator is not so bad there is a problem: the air. While you were pondering, the lion had been burping the gas he accidentally swallowed. That means less oxygen for you! You panic and desperately seek a way out.

The lion, after circling for a few minutes, looking for more of those strange but delicious morsels, yawned, showing his big, sharp teeth. His favorite time of day had come: time to take a nap and digest his food quietly. When he wakes up, his stomach would be empty again, and that would be the perfect excuse to hunt more snacks such as the one that now was (supposedly) digesting in his belly. He walks up to his lair and lazily lies down slowly next to his mate, his stomach swinging with each step. The lioness looks surprised by the size of his belly and sniffs and licks it a few times before falling asleep again. The lion burps one last time, licks his lips and sleeps, enjoying the squirming of the little animal inside him.

You manage to open the sphincter you came from and go up the esophagus. Now that he's asleep, it is very easy. His mouth is open, so you get away without problems. Now you need to find a safe place. If the lion wakes up, he’d probably swallow you again. But if the lioness does, you would be ripped apart!

There, by the lions' water hole, is a small, dark crack in the concrete, large enough for a human of your size to fit within without worries, and probably leading through to the other side. You edge around the pool, trying to make yourself small and unobtrusive. You are almost to your goal when you feel a blast of hot breath hit your back.

You turn. The golden eyes of the lion you'd just escaped from glint down at you. Looks like the sudden emptiness in his belly awoke him.

There is a peculiar kind of knowing in his gaze, as he leans down to nuzzle you with his immense nose.

The lion's black lips seem to smile in the moment before his huge mouth opens up. You would run, but somehow, you're not afraid. His tongue catches you and draws you between his immense teeth, which lock around you, leaving you within a pitch-black, wet cage. You are gently flattened against his soft palate as his tongue undulates beneath you, taking in your flavor. He is taking his time this go-around, which surprises you. A low rumbling emanates from his throat - it might've been his stomach grumbling, but strangely enough it sounded almost like a purr.

Slick with lion saliva, you slide down the tongue head-first into the open throat. The lion's jaws open just a crack, allowing light to refract against his pink uvula and the red flesh of his throat, before it seals around you in a powerful swallow. You glide down the warm, constricting tube, enjoying the sensation of pressure all around your body, before you are pushed through a tight sphincter and tumble into the belly of the lion for the second time.

It is still as warm and cozy as ever inside, though air seems both stale and scarce, as it did before. Strangely, though, you don't feel as though you're in danger of choking, as you did before. Maybe you will learn to accommodate yourself to the thinness of the lion's inner atmosphere. The walls pulse gently. The lion's purring emanates through his whole body, though with it comes the sensation of a growl - a subtle warning to his meal not to try to escape.
14322212122222.title: Back to being a meal.

143222121222222.content:
You relax into the soft stomach wall, letting the lion's purr vibrate your body like a massage. You guess you could get used to this.

The lion, for his part, does not spare you another thought. You were just a tasty meal to him, and you don't really consider the whereabouts of your meals after you've eaten them, even if you might look fondly back on a favorite treat (as the lion often did). Every so often over the course of the years he lives, he might feel a strange wriggling inside his tummy, and a sense of fullness inside him that never really goes away. But, being a lion, he doesn't think too much of it. He is that much the happier for it.

You, meanwhile, settle comfortably into your new home. It is a simple existence, to be sure. You partake of the lion's meals as he eats them, and with difficulty sustain yourself on the same water he drinks, before ushering both onward through his digestive tract, leaving your comfy abode spick-and-span. You are never cold; his body heat warms you. You are never uncomfortable; his stomach lining accommodates your body like a glove fits a hand. You are never alone; the lion is always with you, even if he is not aware of it. A simple existence, but also a carefree one. You would not trade it for any other.

You would never have thought that you might find happiness inside the belly of another living creature, but so it is, and so you live to the very end of your days within the lion.

14322221.content:
You stand before the great den of the bears. From what you can see, the railing is rather tall around this area, and for good reason. Just beyond the railing is a pit, several feet deep and a number of feet wide which eventually ends at a low wall with grass beyond it. Grin on your face and eyes glinting from the challenge of the obstacles you decide to look for a way down the long wall. The wall is upon examination found to be concrete, smooth concrete, with little much to pass for footholds even at your size.

Contemplating the problem you walk along, following edge and studying it. You see some Cracks at some places which seem to extend far down but how far is unknown, You also see an assortment of moss, vines and some other small plants hang over the edges at some points, though they look like they may give away under some weight.

Which way do you choose?
14322221.title: Ursine area

choices: You wake up next to the pond and look around.
You wake up, but you are not alone...
143222211.content:
You decide the plants look like they're barely hanging on as it is and head for the cracks instead. They should give you some solid hand and foot-holds. You peer down into a couple of the cracks before finding one that doesn't seem to change as much as the others in width, so it'll be easier for you to keep up a pace going down.

Climbing down on the inside of the crack is a bit of a challenge, but you feel that you can handle it as you hold your arms and legs out to steady yourself. There isn't much time for you to gaze out and look at your destination so you don't happen to notice the wind picking up and blowing in the leaves.

You may not have seen it coming, but you certainly feel it! With a complete and sudden lurch, the wind picks up great speed and causes such a change in pressure that it threatens to pull you right out of the crack you're in. You cling tight to the holds that you have at your disposal and hope that the wind dies down quickly so that you may continue. The wind however, does not die down. It relentlessly continues to blow until you can hold on no longer and let go.

All at once you feel yourself being pulled out of the crack by the invisible arms of the wind and starting to fall. The falling does not last though, as apparently the wind is so strong and you are so small that it slows you down, maybe even lifts you a little. You feel a sense of vertigo as your world is turned upside-down several times and you lose all sense of direction as the wind blows you about.

It all comes to an end quickly though, as the wind dies down and you really begin to fall. Lucky for you, the wind has brought you all the way across the hard concrete pit and into the living area of the enclosure. At last you hit the ground, hard, with your head. Everything goes black and you pass out. You have landed on the grass inside the enclosure pretty much right next to the little pond of water that's there for drinking from.

You are only out for a few minutes and when you come to...

Stay on the ground and observe the colossal animal.

As you come to and your vision returns you quickly realize you're not alone, wherever you are. The slurping and splashing sounds tell you that much. Taking a look around you see dirt, lots of it, grass too. As you turn your head to see where the sounds are coming from you are only met with a giant wall of brown, brown...fur? Taking a bigger look around, you see claws, you see the ends of the wall and you see that it's attached to a much larger body, all brown and furry of course. Finally you see the head of the body and as you suspected, this was a plain old brown bear, well plain enough at your size.

The bear is drinking from the little pond and causing the splashing noises you heard. Surveying your situation, you see this as good an opportunity as ever to experience the big bears. You think that at your size, the bear probably wouldn't care about something so small climbing on it, but then again you may be able to see more from where you are on the ground.

What do you do?

It shakes quite a bit as you still try to climb up, but again it's easy because of the amount of fur at your disposal.

By the time you make your way up to it's shoulder the bear is practically inside the cave and getting ready to get back to sleep. You continue to climb and when you've almost made it to the top of the bear's back, it lays down to sleep. curling slightly for warmth.

"That might not be such a bad idea" you think to yourself.

What do you do?

Taking a look around you can see the entrance and darkness, but you can hear and feel the bear breathing, it's chest expanding and collapsing with every breath. You can also hear something more, the breathing seems to be off-sync sometimes, leading you to the logical conclusion that there must be more than one bear in here.

You climb down the bear's leg and reach the ground safely and try to look around, but it's still very dark to you. You can see the bear right behind you though, it's form stretching into the distance on either side.

"What to do now?" you think to yourself.

On the one hand you could explore the cave, see what else you bump into. But on the other hand you could explore the bear right behind you, either sounds interesting.

What do you do?

Saliva escaped the ursine's maw and pooled into the ground. You look at the bear in awe, amazed at its size. You are smaller than one of the bear's teeth. You walk around to the front of the bear's face. You can feel it's hot, smelly breath escpe it's open mouth. It's nose twitched a little. You take in every little detail of the beautiful creature.

14322221121221.content:
As you stand there admiring the great beast, completely without notice it yawns on you. The great maw opens wide and inhales a torrent of air so tremendous it threatens to lift you off your feet and into the cavernous mouth. Simultaneously the bear's form expands to contain the inhaled air and becomes a great size larger than it was before, then as with all breaths the exhale begins. Once again air travels through the great bear's mouth, but in the opposite direction, pushing the vast amount of air out again through a narrowing opening as the bear closes it's mouth slightly.

You simply stand and watch it awe as all this happens. Simply to see the mechanics of such a gigantic motion is simply amazing to witness. But something happens that you didn't predict. As the bear exhaled, it also extended it's tongue, which when it went back to the mouth scooped you off the ground as well.

You are deftly brought into the mouth and fall off to the side of the tongue where you lay in saliva. The bear is still groggy from sleeping and hasn't even gotten up yet, let alone noticed you're there.

You are now faced with two choices of what to do about your situation:

You can either stay where you are and hope for the best, one certainly can't get much better of a view of the world if the bear happens to have it's mouth open as it moves about.

You can try to escape the mouth and minimize the chances that any "accident" will happen.

1432222112122111.content:
You decide that if you’re going to explore the bear, might as well do a thorough job. Hopefully, you shouldn’t be in too much danger while it’s asleep. You’ve made it this far in one piece, after all.

You glance back down the pitch black tunnel, seeing the glistening muscular walls of the bear’s gullet expand and relax with each quiet breath. You can’t help feeling a little anxious, knowing very well what awaits you at the bottom, as if the faint gurgles and growls rising up the tunnel don’t make it apparent enough--but you’ve already made up your mind. Taking a deep breath, you take a brief moment to collect your nerves, and then you relax your body, allowing yourself to slowly slide back along the tongue.

You look back again to see your legs dangling freely over the dark pit, and the throat opens wide, as if welcoming you in--but just as you're preparing to let go, the tongue unexpectedly lurches beneath you as the beast gives another great yawn, and the deep intake of breath pulls you back downward. You get one last glimpse of the outside world before you’re completely engulfed in darkness.

14322221121221111.title: Gag reflex

choices: Push your way into the stomach.
14322221121221112.content:
You slide down the tube a short ways before you come to a stop, and you anxiously wonder if you’ve arrived at the stomach. But as you look around, you notice a faint light coming from above you, and you recognize the throat opening. Then you remember that a bear’s esophagus is not the same as a human’s--it doesn’t lead straight down into the stomach, but horizontally. Still, you can’t help wondering why you haven’t been swallowed yet. Somehow, you failed to trigger the animal’s swallowing mechanism, and its body still seems unaware of your presence.

Behind you, you hear the growls coming from the stomach again, louder than before, as if calling to you. Knowing that it’s too steep and slippery to get back up, you decide to crawl towards the stomach, following the sounds deeper and deeper inside the beast.

Since you’re so tiny, the trip seems to take awhile, and you can’t see anything in the pitch black tunnel. All you can do is listen to the rhythmic thump-thump of the bear’s great heart, which is oddly comforting. But your journey comes to an abrupt halt when your head bumps into a soft fleshy wall. You can’t see what’s in front of you, but when you press your ear to it, you can hear gurgles coming from the other side, and you know this is the entrance to the stomach.
14322221121221112.title: Point of No Return

choices: Let the acids digest you away.
You appear to be safe...for now.
143222211212211121.content:
There’s no stopping now. You pull your ear away, and then push your head against the opening, trying to force yourself in. The muscles closing off the entrance are strong, but they easily give in, relaxing just enough to let you through. You manage to get halfway into the stomach before the muscles tighten again and push you the rest of the way, causing you to slide rather unceremoniously down the slippery wall and land in the puddle of water collected at the bottom of the creature’s cavernous belly.

Even though you still can’t see, you know now, without a doubt, that you’re inside the stomach--the very core of the bear’s body. It’s ten time more hot and humid in here than inside the mouth, and the place positively reeks of rotten meat--but you feel strangely at home in here.

The bear's stomach gives another content gurgle.

Hearing the soft gurgles of the stomach all around, you smile and lay in the liquid, it had been a fantasy to be fed to a bear, and now that fantasy is real, only one thing left, and you know you'll enjoy it: Digestion.

You stretch and relax, waiting for the wonderful process to start... None too soon did you wish for it, when the bear woke up, it felt your taste faintly on it's tongue, the stomach gurgled louder and started to churn, acids pouring into the food sack, you closed your eyes as you felt them upon you, wincing a bit as you moaned in bliss, slowly dissolving away, adding yourself to the mighty beast...

But you know that if you still want to live, you can’t stay in here for long. Very soon, the bear will wake from its nap, and once it eats, that’ll be the end of you.

Looking down on you was another large bear, but this time, you could tell that this planet sized ursine was a female. You're frozen in fear as the she-bear stomps forward and sniffs at you. You really hope that the crap on you hides the scent of fresh meat.
1432222112122111212221112121212.title: Third try

choices: You grab the uvula (and make her puke)
14322221121221112122211121212122.content: Unfortunately for you, all the crap has fallen off of you and with it your scent. The she-bear lets out a loud growl and opens her mouth wide. You turn to try and run away but then she sticks out her tongue and pushes it through the ground. You scream as the tongue knocks you down and scoops you up. Another mouth and with your luck another stomach. But then you see a beacon of hope; the bear's uvula. If you can grab onto it, you might have a chance of avoiding being swallowed. You reach out your hand as the she bear tilts her head and sends you down towards her awaiting throat.
14322221121221112122211121212122.title: Can't get a break

143222211212211121222111212121222.content:
You try and reach for the uvula and your salvation, but when it looks like you're about to grab it, the bear tilts her head again and you slide down her esophagus screaming. You land with a splash in the she-bear's stomach. This was not your lucky day. No matter what happened it seems like you were destined to end the day in a bear's tummy. As you get up, the whole stomach rumbles as the she-bear lets out a loud burp causing you to fall flat in the stomach goo again. You swear that you could hear the bear giggling to herself girlishly after that earth shaking burp but your ears must've been playing tricks on you. You're so frustrated with your situation that you pound on her stomach walls. But then you turn to see the stomach liquids churning.

What happens next?
143222211212211121222111212121222.title: You miss "Gulp!"

choices: You slip and fall in the acid
1432222112122111212221112121212221.content:
Suddenly you yell loudly because your leg is burning. You blow on your leg. Then you realize something and let out a gasp because your leg was red. The stomach acid was actually effecting you. Unlike the two other bears that ate you, this she-bear was actually digesting you. You turn your head to see that this girl bear had just eaten raw meat. You had to get out of here or you'd be digested into soup in this massive ursine. You run through the acid as it keeps burning you and see that your skin appears to be melting off. You yell in pain and then you trip over something and fall face first into the acid. You get up and yell and then you gasp and see what you tripped on was a tiny skull... a human skull. You weren't the first human to be shrunk at this zoo? What was happening? Were there other bones in the stomachs of lions, tigers and maybe even elephants.

You didn't have time to think so you climb the meat the bear ate as it sunk and jump up and desperately try to climb up the esophagus.. will you make it to the mouth and escape?
1432222112122111212221112121212221.title: Digested by a She-Bear

14322221121221112122211121212122212.content:
You try as you might to climb the female bear's large esophagus. But as you're about to get a quarter of the way up, you begin to slip. "Oh no!" you yell. "Oh no, oh no, oh no! Ah!" The slimy esophagus is too much for you and you slip and fall down. You try to land on the raw meat to try again, but the meat has already sunk into the she bear's stomach acid and you scream as you plummet down. You land with a big splash in the acid and sink down. You try to swim up but as you do so the acids take effect melting you to the bone. You had been digested by a female bear.

Outside the bear lets out a burp and then rubs her chest, enjoying the taste you left in her mouth, even with the crap. And now she waits for another unlucky visitor to the zoo to be shrunk, so she may once again taste the same flavor you left in her big stomach. You're nothing more than more fat for her long hibernation.
14322221121221112122211121212122212.title: Deadly Slip

1432222112122111212221112121212222.content: You realize that the stomach is devoid of acids but still churning like it is digesting food. Realizing this you decide to try to get out so you choose to get out via
1432222112122111212221112121212222.title: You're not digested

choices: Wait for the bear to go.
14322221121221112122211121212122221.content: You pry the bottom of the stomach open, and slide into the small intestines. In here you aren't able to move due to how cramped it is. After a while you slide into the large intestines where you are able to stand up, well, crouch because it's not big enough to completely stand up. You continue making your way along when you finally reach the end of the line. Here you decide to....
14322221121221112122211121212122221.title: The other end

You decide you can rest in here for a while. After about an hours nap, you wake up to realize you're still in the bear, but you're not alone. Behind you is the remains of some food she must of ate after you left her stomach, and you somewhat regret on waiting. After a while of waiting, the bear feels some pressure in her rear and finds a place to do her business. After finding a sutible place she crouches over and begins to push.
Inside you can feel the walls begin to pulshate and push you toward her ass hole, but not before encasing you in her left overs, but leaving your head free. With a few grunts, the log you're in starts to emerge from her rear. after a minute your head is out in the open and you can now breath fresh air, along with hearing the bear you were just in grunitng as she expels you.

After another push, the log you were in falls free from her and lands on the ground with a wet PLOP, but you aren't out of the woods as the bear continues to go. After 2 minutes, she's done and you're in a pile that takes a while to dig out of. After finally freeing your self, you decide to...
143222211212211121222111212121222211.title: Wait for the bear to go.

143222211212211121222111212121222212.content: You decide you don't want to wait any longer then you have to. You learn forward and push your way out. It takes a bit of effort but after a few minutes you're finally out of the bear. You smell your self and realize you smell horrible so you...
143222211212211121222111212121222212.title: Pry your way out.

choices: A place where you can wash up.
1432222112122111212221112121212222122.content: You decided you don't want to risk being eaten again, and you want to get rid of the horrid smell you have now. So you find the exit and begin looking for some place to wash up. shortly after leaving the enclosure you find...
1432222112122111212221112121212222122.title: Leave the enclosure.

14322221121221112122211121212122221221.content:
You look and see an exhibit that had water at the edge of it and figure you might as well wash the stench off yourself there. You run inside the exhibit and dive into the water and begin to wash yourself off until there isn't a trace of that bear sludge on you. You couldn't believe you survive being eaten and digested three times. You swear it took at least an hour to clean all that mess up from three digestive systems.

You swim in the water having gotten completely cleaned off, but then you bump into something. You feel the wall and realize it isn't a wall at all. You had wound up in another exhibit with an aquatic animal and you were right in front of its face. But what kind of aquatic creature was it?
14322221121221112122211121212122221221.title: Washing Up

143222211212211121222112.content:
You're taking no chances and run out of the bear habitat as you shake the crap off. But you feel daring having survived the digestive system of such a giant beast. As we run off from the habitat, you see a sign and look up to see there are two new routes to take. You want to see what else you can take on.

Which way to you go?
143222211212211121222112.title: get out of the bears habitat

143222211212212.content: You obviously can't stay here. The only thing that would be in a bear's mouth is food. You have to run out of here. But as you try to run, the tongue is going back and slowing you down and to make matters worse, the bear's mouth is closing quickly. Do you make it before the mouth closes?
143222211212212.title: Try to escape and go off somewhere else.

14322221122.content:
You decide to stay on the ground and have a look. The first of those being a good look from where you are. You can see the body of the bear extending high up into the air, the hind of the bear reaching deep into the grass beyond the dirt and the paw which must be several times larger than you. You are in total awe of the creature as you walk under it, the massive form completely covering your view of the sky.

You go around to the water to get a good look at it's head, which was a mistake as the bear shifts it's stance as you near the water's edge. It's paw collides softly, but strongly with you and sends you flying out into the pond. Before you know it, you've splashed into the water and your whole world is blue for a second, but only that second as you are lifted out of the water by the bear's tongue.

You don't even have time to take a breath before the tongue launches you into the bear's mouth. Landing hard on the bear's still-lapping tongue and in a pool of water you take a moment to try and scramble away and out of the mouth but to no avail, the bear has just filled it's mouth and swallows.

Your world is pushed up and what little light you had from outside is blocked by the rising tongue as you're swept up in the current leading to the gullet of the big bear. The motion slides you through the open gullet and down the bear's throat until you finally splash down into it's stomach.

In shock, all you can do is tread water as you take your first breaths since you were launched into the water. The air tastes foul, but it is needed. Your environment is very dark and humid as you splash around trying to find a way out.

But it's already too late, the digestive juices have seeped into the water and are already at work dissolving your body. You don't even notice it before you lose conciousness and finally become part of the bear.
14322221122.title: Swept up in the current

choices: Look for a vine to climb up the wall?
See if you can find a ramp or something at the end of the pit?
143222212.content:
You decide that climbing down the plant-life would be a safer choice than trying your luck with the rocky cracks.

A thick vine convine-iently hangs over the edge near hangs over the edge near you. It looks sturdy enough, so you go over to it and look down to see if it reaches the bottom. Lucky for you, you can see the vine sticking out from bottom of the wall.

All things are clear for go, so go you do. Climbing down the vine is tiresome as you need to keep a continuous grip on it all the time except when it curves at which point you can lean into the vine for rest.

Along the climb down, you can't help but surveying the den from where you are. You can see that after the wall rises again at the other end of the pit that a grassy area stretches on for a bit before a small pond comes to view. Beyond the pond you can see the rocky cliff-like area housing the caves where the bears sleep.

As you continue down the vine, a problem arises. You weren't decieved when you saw the vine lying on the floor of the pit, but you failed to notice that it was a parallel vine which extended to the bottom and not yours. At the end of your line, so to speak, you only saw one way to get further down outside of some lethal skydiving. The only way you can see is to somehow swing or jump to the other vine from the end of your own. So,you gather your courage and start to give the thin elastic end of the vine some momentum. It swings back and forth, closer and closer to the other vine before get so close you can almost touch it, at that point you make the jump.

The wind rushes by you and the whole thing is over in an instant, but you caught it all in your eyes. As you let go of the vine you were in free-fall for a second, you flew across the tiny gap and began to doubt your plan, but you had no time to think before colliding with the other vine. You didn't immediately catch hold of the vine, but after a short and nerve-wrackIng slide down it, you got a good grip on one of the leaflets sprouting from the vine.

After catching your breath you continued to climb the rest of the way down uneventfully. Your next mission now is to find a way up the smaller wall across the pit.

You're sure you could probably find another vine or something to climb up the wall, but looking around you, you see the pit extending far to each side. Perhaps there is a ramp on one end that you can just walk up?
143222212.title: Scaling the cliff

choices: Sneak inside and find out what the cage holds
Continue on the endless path to new areas

143222221.content: you decide to go inside since it doesn't have a sign.
143222221.title: curious

1432222211.content: You go inside the cage and under the foliage blocking the entire view. There must've been some unusual animal in here. As you walk forward you look in pure surprise. This was no ordinary animal. It was the one animal you'd never expect to see... ever. It was a...

choices: For the last time, I want a Unicorn, darn it!
143222221111121.content: So, Unicorn or Queen Chrysalis?

Wil it be the Goddess of the Sun?

Will you choose the Goddess of the Night?

Or
