143222221111212.title: Luna/Nightmare Moon.

14322222111122.content: The dare devil Rainbow Dash or the animal lover Fluttershy?
14322222111122.title: Pegasi.

143222221112.content:
You see a unicorn. Yeah, a unicorn. It's coat is bright white, and seems to shine even though the cage is dark. The mane of the magic equine is a pale brown, and is long and flowing. The tail is long and only has a tuft of hair on the tip. You see how the unicorn is facing away from you, lying on its side to its rear faces you. You decide to check out this magical creature, confused by its very existence.

As you walk around past its hind legs, you steal a glance between it's hind legs and notice that the unicorn is...
143222221112.title: Investigating the unicorn

choices: She opens her maw and floats you toward it!
She decides to show mercy because you didn't hurt her
1432222211122.content:
Before you can do anything else, though, you're enveloped in a glowing blue aura and lifted off the ground. You flail your arms and legs wildly, but to no avail. You fly to the unicorn's face, where you hover inches away. You see the unicorn's horn glowing blue, and realize she has you in her magical grip.

"Hello, human," a soft, young-sounding feminine voice says in your head. You realize that's the unicorn talking with her mind.

"I'm sure you're wondering why you're so small," she continues. You nod, and you think you notice her smile slightly.

"Yes... Well, that was me. I sensed you here long after all the other humans had left..."

(You remember that's because you fell asleep in a secluded place and awoke shrunken after closing time)

"... So, I shrunk you. Let me tell you, human: I expected you to die. I'm amazed you survived long enough to find me. But now, you've reached me. Perhaps I should reward such bravery and tenacity.... Tell me, do you know why I shrunk you?"

You shake your head, and the unicorn continues, her eyes narrowing. "For revenge, little human. Your kind took me from my home and trapped me here. They have already wounded me."

She floats you to her back, where you see several scars that look like they were caused by whips. She floats you back to her face, an angry look on her face.

"Somebody needs to pay," she says. "If I find the ones who did this to me, I will make them suffer greatly. But for you, I have other plans. You did not do this to me, but you are a human, and I hate your kind now. So, I know what to do with you...."
1432222211122.title: Female

14322222111222.content:
"I'll le t you live, for now," she says, making you sigh in relief. "But I still hate your kind. So I won't let your suffering end yet. You're going to stay this size, little human... Onky one thing will make me rurn you back."

She floats you away from her, and grins.

"Find me."

A flash of white blinds you, and when you can see again, you've apparently been teleported away from her. Clearly, she wants you to look for her like some sort of game, but first of all, where did she teleport you?
14322222111222.title: She decides to show mercy

choices: ...continue to walk into the avian area?
...backtrack and see if you missed anything along the way?
143222222.content: You continue to travel down the path, but come to a stop when you notice a change around you. Somehow you've walked right into the avian area where all the birds are kept. This isn't quite the way you wanted to go. Do you...
143222222.title: A new area

choices: Slip out, it won't notice.. Maybe?
Make as much noise as possible!
1432222221.content:
Your pretty much tired out, and can't be bothered to check for any places you missed along the way. So instead you decide to enter the aviary, after all - birds just eat nuts and fruit right?

So, you continue along the path until you come to a cloaked door, the kind where you push past a plastic barrier to stop free roaming birds from escaping.

You realize pushing past isn't gonna be as easy as it was when you were 'normal sized', regardless you charge at the barrier, and it let's you slip through surprisingly easily.

You are instantly greeted by a wave of hot, humid, tropical air. "Phew!" you gasp "It's boiling in here.."
As it's night time the enclosure is pitch black and silent, you even begin to doubt that anything even lives here!

But just then, you here the beating of two enormous wings and a pair of scaly talons grab around your waist, now your prey..

You scream loudly, but the bird just tightens it's grip on you... It swoops with you towards it's perch, where it will prepare to eat you..

You gotta escape before it gets a chance!!!
1432222221.title: In the Aviary...

choices: You get caught in midair by something....
You land somewhere safely, away from animals, for now...
14322222211.content:
You squirm as much as possible, determined to not let this bird keep its grip on you! Somehow, you manage to free an arm, and begin hitting the talons as hard as you can. The bird makes a quiet noise, as if it was slightly hurt. However, its grip just tightens, making you shout in pain. You don't think you'll be able to get away--and even if you do, you'll just fall to your death far below....

However, the bird begins to turn, becoming angled so your head faces down. You begin to feel yourself slipping, and realize that with this new angle, the bird doesn't have as good a grip on your tiny body, and you're about to be dropped accidentally! Even though you were just struggling to get out, now you start struggling to grab onto the bird so you won't fall, but you can't get a good enough hold, and you slip out of the bird's grasp!
14322222211.title: Try to escape the bird's grip!

choices: It decides you're food, and tries to eat you!
Another bird wants you for itself!
14322222212.content:
You start squirming and shouting, trying to get the bird annoyed so it would let you go. Instead, just as before, the noise you make just causes the bird to tighten its grip on you. Now it's squeezing you very tightly, and it's starting to hurt a lot. You stat to panic instead, and though it would be better to stop struggling, the panic makes you keep squirming to get out of the vice-like talons.

Luckily, the bird releases you soon, but you realize you've been placed on a wooden platform high up towards the top of the enclosure. You get your first look at the bird as it stands over you, it's feet on either side of you and it's head bent to look right at you. You realize the bird is simply a brightly colored parrot.

The bird's head cocks back and forth, as if it's trying to figure out what you are...
14322222212.title: Will you become parrot food?

choices: Go in and see them all
Keep retracing your steps to see what else you missed
1432222222.content:
You don't know how you did it, but you managed to miss the very wide pathway to all the herbivores. Looking up at the sign in front of the path you can see that it lists some of the residents in that section as horses, hogs, bison, kangaroos, rhinoceros, hippos and more!

Do you want to go in and check them out or do you keep going back to see what else you missed?
1432222222.title: The unseen way

14322222221.content: You skate down the path until you reach a fork in the road. Looking up at the tall signpost above you, you can just barely make out the words "<-- Hippoes" & "--> Giraffes". Which way will you go?
14322222221.title: Which Way?

143222222211.content: The hippoes sounded interesting, so you decide to check them out. Soon, you see a large pool behind a set of steel bars. After reading the sign on the gate, you know you found the right place. The path continues on, so will you...
143222222211.title: Hippo Cage

1432222222111.content: Cautiously stepping inside, you see that most of the hippoes are sleeping. You head deeper into their complex, through the grass and plants lining the pool. You soon reach the edge of the lake. Now, you can swim across or walk alongside the lake.
1432222222111.title: Hippo Lake

14322222221111.content:
Thinking that there may be something interesting across the lake, you ditch the skateboard and dive in. However, you miscalculated the distance you'd be swimming and around halfway there, your last bit of strength dies out. You notice a large green object floating in the water. Too tired to think, you board it and lay down to take a nap.

Minutes later, however, you're awakened by a loud splash. You stand up to see a large hippo swimming towards you. Wondering what it wants with you, you look down to realize that the thing you slept on is a head of cabbage. Unfortunately, its too late to do anything. The massive maw opens, taking you and the cabbage in all at once. The teeth grind on your tiny body, chewing you until you're nomb all over. Then, in one quick gulp, you and the cabbage dissapear into the gullet of the hippo. You plop down into a rather large stomach, and upon landing in the slimy fluids the acids begin their work. You're digested before the numbness from the chewing can even wear off.
14322222221111.title: Swim or Die Tryin'

14322222221112.content:
Deciding that swimming across the lake would be too much hard work, you decide to pace around the edge.

You pause for a moment, something feels odd.. Are there even any hippos in here? You lean over, peering into the murky grey water. It seems surprisingly quiet.

Whilst you're observing the tranquil lake, you hear a large grunt coming from behind you.. The ground then begins to shake, an earthquake?? You give a scream and flail your arms, but fortunately you don't fall into the lake

Wondering what all that racket was, it dawns on you that they were footsteps.. Big footsteps..

Slowly, you turn your head..

Standing behind you is a huge, male hippo..
14322222221112.title: In the hippo exhibit..

143222222211121.content:
The hippo lowers it's huge head, and it's nostrils begin to sniff you, as he heavily exhales, the gust almost blows you back, you're petrified of what will happen next..

..You thought hippos were vegetarians, but this one seems keen to make you his next meal, well.. Snack.

With yet another grunt, it slowly opens it's huge maw.. Saliva hangs out of it's huge mouth, and a large glob drops on you, covering you in the slimy warm substance..

You can feel it's hot breath as it slowly moves it's hungry jaws closer towards you.. It lifts you with it's front teeth then tilts his head back, letting you fall into his waiting maw.

You let out a scream as it's huge flat tongue rubs against you, drenching you in saliva..

Until now, you'd been petrified, and unable to move, but now reality has hit.. You're food...
143222222211121.title: You're hippo food..

choices: ...you are seemingly immune to the digestive acids.
1432222222111211.content:
In complete shock, you cannot move a muscle, and the hippo takes advantage of this to taste his little snack. The hippo savors your taste a bit, lathering your entire body with it's slimy saliva before deciding to swallow you. You are reluctantly forced into it's throat, which opens wide, welcoming you inside. Slowly, you slip down the fleshy tunnel, getting one last view of earth before the hippo shuts it's huge maw and you are pulled deeper into the beast. It grunts, happy to eat you. The grunt echoes throughout it's esophagus and the sheer volume of it nearly deafens you. You can hear the loud thumps of it's heart beats as you pass his chest, and shortly thereafter you are deposited into the vast stomach. The hippo's gut churns and gurgles, still digesting it's previous meal. It positively reeks of digested food and what you guess is vomit.

Outside, the hippo stands there in a nearly trance-like state, drooling slightly from the mouth as he still tastes you on his tongue. Eventually, he can no longer taste you, and moves on. The hippo goes about his business, waddling around his habitat and interacting with other hippos. He gets into the water for some fun and swims around some before deciding to settle down and take a nap.

Meanwhile, in his stomach...
1432222222111211.title: Swallowed by the hippo

14322222221112111.content:
An hour has passed within the hot, churning stomach, and you haven't been affected in any way by the acids! The food inside, however, has been melted down into a thick, reeking, lake, surrounding you, coating you in the filthy gunk.

While the massive hippo is asleep, the contents of the stomach begin to drain into the small intestine.

At the far end of the stomach, you hear a squelch, and feel some of the digested remains being sucked out, drawing you nearer to the sphincter. Several gulps later, you are sucked past the hole with incredible force into the winding small intestine. You are slowly pulled along with the flow of the gunk, thousands of tiny villi caressing and massaging you along the way. A few hours pass, and you draw nearer to the sphincter leading to the large intestine.
14322222221112111.title: ...you are being digested!

143222222211121111.content:
The pink ring of flesh wraps around you, and squeezes you into a much larger area, the colon! You are blasted by a foul stench, emanating from all around the brown-streaked cavern. The muscular walls are pulsating all around you, coating you in a slimy, reeking, residue.

The hippo has waken up, and has begun to walk around.

Your world begins to shake and move, making you lose balance, and falling deeper down the large intestine. The massive movements of the beast combined with the peristaltic movements of the colon send you into a massive pile of hippo dung! The shit is thick, making it hard to get out of the mess. The walls then collapse around you, compacting the turd, and pushing it further forward, closer to the rectum, closer to freedom!
143222222211121111.title: Push onward

1432222222111211111.content:
More and more thick dung begins to accumulate behind you for the next hour and a half. You then feel yourself get pushed slowly into the rectum.

You then realize something sickening, you have seen how hippo's often do their business, where they press their tail back, and shake it violently, spraying feces all around the area!

Does this hippo shit in that manor?
1432222222111211111.title: Getting shit out

choices: Ground, still in the Hippo exhibit
14322222221112111112.content: You are still encased within a slimy reeking turd as you are pushed by powerful rectal muscles towards the hippo's anus. The thick orifice squeezing you out, and to your dismay, you are swatted away by the tail of the beast. You are sent flying through the air. Where do you land?
14322222221112111112.title: Shit sprayer

1432222222111212.content: You suddenly find your courage and, thinking of nothing else, attempt to stand. Well, you managed to get into a crawling position. Very carefully you creep toward the light - the hippo's mouth slightly ajar. You make it to the tip of it's titanic tongue, peering through the hippo's teeth to the world outside. Peeking over your shoulder you see the large black void that lead to certain death. Shuddering, you now begin to wonder how you're going to get out. You could stand up and try to jump, or you could get off the tongue and try to climb over the hippo's yellow teeth.

If you didn't break free fast, you'd drown in the stomach of a female hippo. Of course, drowning is the least of your problems as you're still swimming in acid.
1432222222111212121222112.title: The tongue catches you!

143222222211121212122212.content:
The current of water pulling at your body proved to be too much for you to handle. Your grip is slipping on the slick mountain of a canine. Finally, you collect your nerve and let go. For a second, you are submerged under the strong current. Soon, you resurface above the river. You are moving at a very fast pace straight for the throat. Before you are swallowed, you take one last look at the world around you. The yellow teeth of the hippo's large mouth surround you. All around you, you are surrounded by the soft, pink flesh of the hippo's mouth. The massive tongue beneath you pushes the liquid towards the throat. It rises up and down quickly with each swallow, pushing you backwards violently, then sucks you back towards the throat. You can hear each wet gulp rising up from the throat ahead. The throat appears and disappears behind the tongue with each gulp. It flexes and relaxes, showing you it power. You prepare yourself as you approach the throat.

Soon, the throat is just in front of you. The tongue lowers and the throat opens up to suck you in. You are quickly pulled with the rest of the water into the large hole, and you begin your short journey to the stomach. You hear the GULP all around you as the muscle push the water down into the esophagus. All around you, you hear the gurgles from the stomach getting closer. Because you were swallowed with water, your journey down the esophagus is short. You are quickly dumped into the foul-smelling stomach.

You land with a splash into the water-filled chamber. The walls of the stomach churn the water and you around. Gurgles and rumbles are heard all around you as the stomach begins to digest. You swim around in the water, trying to keep your head above the water as best as you can.

The hippo stops swallowing the water, It knows is swallowed you and it grunts happily. It heads to the shallow area of the water to rest so it can digest you easier.

But are you digested?
143222222211121212122212.title: Go with the Flow

choices: There are More Shrunken People in here with You
1432222222111212121222122.content:
As you're swimming through the digestive fluids, you accidentally swallow some and begun to gag. You're holding your neck as you surface and wait for the stomach juices to turn you into a pile of goop. However, as you look down, you see that for some reason, the hippo's stomach acids had no effect on you. Outside, the hippo lets out a grunt as the juices slosh around in her huge stomach.

You're forced to keep swimming to avoid being pummeled by the waves of gastric juices. How was this happening. It's bad enough that you were shrunken to the size of a bug. Now you were in the stomach of a giant female hippopotamus. Why would the hippos even try to eat you at all?

As you're trying to wrap your head around this situation, the hippo lets out a loud burp and shakes the entire stomach. You scream as the waves in the stomach get even more intense and you're tossed around until you hit the sides of the stomach walls. You're gasping for breath as you try to stay afloat. That's when you hear some strange splashing sounds and even rumbling noises. What now?
1432222222111212121222122.title: Belly of the Beast

choices: Crying, you're not the only one trapped in the hippo's gut
Laughter, the hippo can talk and is speaking to you.
14322222221112121212222.content: Unfortunately all of the shaking proved too much for you, you couldn't hold on another second and screamed as you fell tumbling down into the pit of no return. You slid down the she hippo's tongue and down into her throat as she gave a large gulp. You tried to fight it, but it was too slippery and you slid screaming down the esophagus. You never thought you'd ever be eaten alive, especially not by a hippo. In seconds you slid and landed with a splash in the hippo's huge smelly belly. You look around in horror at half digested cabbages and grass. It hit you hard, you were nothing more than food for a hungry girl hippo. As you try to grab your bearings, you hear something strange. You couldn't believe it. This sound was.
14322222221112121212222.title: Down her Hatch

143222222211121212122221.content: The sound was crying and it sounded human. There was another human shrunken down to size and in here, the hippo's belly with you. You couldn't believe it. You get up and walk through the stomach juices which for some reason weren't burning you. The hippo's foul smelling belly gurgles and some gas blows from the top that makes you gag. As you step forward, you get a giant leave of cabbage stuck to your leg and have to shake it off. You make it to the other side of the female hippo's fat belly and see you're not alone. There's another shrunken human in this belly and the crying shrunken human with you was...
143222222211121212122221.title: You Are Not Alone

choices: "I just got swallowed too." Must've got swallowed with you without you noticing.
"I-I dunno how long..." Months, maybe years in here before your arrival.
1432222222111212121222212.content:
In the near-darkness of the hippopotamus' vast stomach, you could not identify the other shrunken human by sight. Their crying was high-pitched and hiccupy; their body curled up to the slimy, convulsing wall of the stomach, up to their chest into the soupy digestive mire through which you waded, since it could not really be avoided. They looked... so small. Pity thrummed in your heart, and you kneeled beside the curled-up figure.

"... Hey." You spoke as softly as you could above the burbling ambiance of the beast's belly. Wide eyes looked up at you, and you looked into the face of a young boy, no more than eight, maybe nine years old. His whole body starts as he looks at you--he must not've expected a fellow inmate.

"A-are you for real?" he asks, his voice strained with tears. You give a curt nod, and a wry half-smirk that communicates, 'I can only WISH I wasn't.' Even so, he grasps at your wrist, as if to confirm by touch that you're actually here, in front of his eyes. Then he seems to relax. "Y-you got eaten too, huh..." There's a faint timbre of relief in his voice, of happiness that, at least, he's not alone.

You sit down next to him in the grime, as the she-hippo vents a powerful belch that shakes the whole stomach and blasts you with vile-smelling wind. "Yeah... Just now, I got swallowed. How long have you been down here, kid?"
1432222222111212121222212.title: A prisoner in the stomach with you.

choices: Run Around and Make Her Sick
14322222221112121212222122.content:
"I-I dunno how long," says Curt. "I can't remember how long I've been here." You notice that Curt's clothes, or what's left of them seem small on him. "What grade are you in kid?" you ask. "M-My name is Kurt, and I-I'm in second grade. I w-went to this zoo on a field trip and the next thing I knew, there was nobody else in the zoo and I was shrunk so small." Second grade? This kid must've been down here for years. What a terrifying experience.

"After I shrunk, I went all around the zoo looking for help and fell into the water in the hippo exhibit. I thought they wouldn't hurt me since they only eat vegetables, but one hippo snuck up behind me and I've been in her tummy ever since. I've had to eat half digested cabbage to survive and drink this yucky stomach juice." "You poor kid. It's a wonder neither of us has been digested.Your folks must be worried about you. We've got to get you out of here."

"But how!?" yells Curt crying. "I've been trying to get out of the hippo hundreds of times." You try to think of a plan when you finally decide how you and this child trapped in the belly of this titaness hippo are going to escape.
14322222221112121212222122.title: We've Got to Get Out of Here

As you contemplate your situation, you hear a noise: female laughter. You quickly look behind you. "Who else is in here?"

You hear a response. "No one else is in there. I'm out here. And by the way, you were delicious."

Wait, what?

Confused, you ask, "Are you the..."

"The hippo that ate you? Yes, you nitwit."

You're shocked. You were shrunken to nigh microscopic size, eaten by a hippopotamus and she's now speaking to you. As you try to wrap your head around this situation, you have to cover your ears as the hippopotamus burps and rocks her entire stomach up. "Mmm," says the hippo. "Mmm, mmm. Normally I'm a vegetarian, but when a gal sees one of those shrunken visitors wandering around her cage, well, she just can't help herself. You've got to be the best human I've ever eaten."

She burps again and you fall back into the stomach juices and even cough because you just swallowed some half digested...something. "Uh, excuse me, Mrs. Giant fat hippopotamus that ate me." The hippo floats in the water as she yawns before answering. "What is it?" she asks.

The stomach begins to bubble and one bubble releases putrid gas that makes you cough. "Well, I was wondering... can I get out of your belly... please." Suddenly you hear more female laughter and the stomach juice shakes around. "My meal is asking me to come out?" asks the hippo. "Oh, that's rich."

You cross your fingers before the hippo gives you her answer.

You fall on your behind and realize the kangaroo is asleep. It's colored a very light red, almost pink, and you stumble away from it. Taking in its form, you can tell this one is even smaller than the first, and especially the second. It must be very young.

Perhaps this was a bad idea. Suddenly, you feel more rumbling and fall to the ground. This causes you to roll to the side of a grape and you're in shock because the grape is even bigger than you. You did get smaller! But for what reason. At your current height, you'd say you were now 1/8 of an inch tall. You look forward and see an elephant that had to be twelve feet tall; way, way, way bigger than your current height. As the elephant looks at you, you realize something. Not only was this elephant another female elephant but she looked like a paler shade of gray and seemed older than any other elephant in the exhibit. She must be the leader of the elephants. The matriarch if you will.

The matriarch elephant looks down and trumpets as she stares at you, somehow noticing you even at your more minuscule than before height. You try to run but the matriarch elephant can easily catch up with you by walking very slowly given your size difference. Finally, the matriarch decides to...
14322222221221112121.title: The Matriarch

143222222212211121211.content:
The 12 foot tall elderly African elephant lowers her trunk to sniff you in order to further inspect you. Given the last elephant you encountered tried to eat you, you did not want to take any chances and try to run as the elephant matriarch's trunk tries to wrap around you. You move in a zigzag manner to avoid being grabbed by the trunk right before the elephant lets out an annoyed trumpet and starts to inhale.

You look and see the long trunk sucking air in like an overgrown vacuum. At your shrunk to 1/8th of an inch tall form, it feels like a storm and you try to outrun the vortex only for it to pull you screaming in as you get sucked into the nostril of the elephant matriarch. Inside the nose, you try to stand but the half petrified elephant mucas doesn't make it easy for you and you start to slip further down the nose. "No!" you yell. "Oh no, oh no, oh no! I'm gonna be eaten by an elephant's nose!"

However, then the trunk shifts and you slide down before the nostril flexes and you look out and see that the elephant has brought you in front of her moon sized eyes. Each one was more than ten times bigger than you. The elephant squints as you shake inside her nose and then she does something that catches you by surprise; She speaks.

"Interesting," says the elephant in a thunderous contralto, her voice rattling your ears. "A 1/8 inch tall human being. I've seen small humans back in Africa but never as small as you." You were shocked. "Y-Y-You can talk?" you ask the elephant. The elephant nods her head and trumpets slightly as you cover her ears.

This was one heck of a day. The other female elephant tried to swallow you and now the matriarch, the biggest and oldest elephant in the zoo, was speaking to you. But what will this gray giantess do with a 1/8 human?
143222222212211121211.title: In the Trunk

As you step out of the pool, you realize that maybe hanging around the elephants might be a terrible idea given that one of them almost ate you and who knows how many other elephants might mistake you for food. You definitely don't want to risk being swallowed again and decide to hightail it out of there.

Over time you had entered countless worlds, yet never before had you felt so disorientated by your arrival. Your eyes blurred and, as you sat up, you could not help but wonder if something had gone horribly wrong. Fortunatly you seemed well enough, simply disorientated. However as you glanced about your surroundings you quickly found that you were in a massive forest; the trees seemed to rise upward forever. The foliage was huge, but with no animals around you could not be certain wether all the creatures of this world were so huge; it might be hard to communicate with them if they were. It was as you sat down to ponder this that you felt a gradual tapping against your foot. At first you thought it was simply an itch, but as it grew in ferocity you realized something was trying to get your attention. It quickly dawned on you that with such huge trees other things may be out of porportion in the opposite manner; it was possibly an entire tiny race of beings lived here!

Being so close to your foot, you had to be very careful not to accidently hit the tiny person. Fortunatly you kept still as you leaned forward to examine the being. To your utter astonishment the creature seemed to be none other than Popka! Your old friend was so tiny that you feared lifting him might inflict too much unintentional damage, and instead you simply layed down with your ear beside him. "Popka?! How did you get so little?" The voice in your ear was faint but you managed to make out his words. It appeared that shortly after you had left Lunatea, people began to vanish. It seemed that Popka had likewise been pulled into this strange realm, and had found himself at tiny size. He also reported, grimly enough, that about half of the people were instead magnified to a monumental height. Some tried to be nice to the shrunken creatures, but others had begun to capture and even eat them! It seemed that, having entered on your own, you had maintained your original size. This made you a giant compared to the shrunken half, unfortunatly you were still equally tiny to the giant half.

After carefully placing Popka into your pocket, you rose back to your feet and glanced around. It was obvious that something was pulling people into this realm, and you needed to do your best to find out what it was. On the other hand you, with your height, could exist pretty comfortably in this world for a while; perhaps you could try having a bit of fun with it.

Certainly, a meal hard to beat. She did not care if the creature in her stomach was a human or just a bug: she only cared about the pleasant feeling that caused her having a living being inside her body. That light tingling produced by its little feet, walking endlessly in her innards, vainly looking for an escape route ... combined with the satisfaction that produced her, since she was a puppy, the fact of having a full stomach. She lies down slowly, her bulging stomach swaying from side to side, gurgling. She burps and licks her lips slowly. She yawns. Her sharp, white teeth, her long and spongy tongue ... certainly the store manager looks after the pets perfectly. Her throat opens for a moment, showing the fleshy passage that sealed your fate. Here, you fall face first into the fish tank and are immediately snapped up by something... Or someONE.

You're unsure what has eaten you, but based on their fleshy insides, it's definitely a scaly creature of some sort. Oh yeah, it also speaks. It's definitely feminine, as you can clearly her triumphant belch at your entry into her belly.

You press your hands against her stomach walls, and they're stretchier than the dog's by far. You're not kicking your way out of this one.

Before determining a course of action, though, you need to figure out WHAT you're inside.

What is it?
1541122221121.title: You fall into the fish tank

choices: Go over to the snake tank.
Go over to the iguana tank.
1542.content:
You decide to stay away from the huge dog and check out the other animals, you wonder how they would look to you at this size. You see a huge counter and try to find a way to climb up onto it. Walking around it, you see a broom leaning against the counter and grab on to one of the bristles. You start to climb on it, slowly working your way up, grabbing different strands of whatever it's made of and pulling as hard as you can. After a bit, you manage to climb up to the shaft, but it is tiring work, and you still needed to get up the large wooden pole. You grab on to it with your arms and legs and inch upwards a little bit at a time. For the first time ever you're glad that you take gym class, because it takes only a little bit to get up to the top. You take a small jump over to the top of the counter and then stop to catch your breath.

You see a large row of glass tanks, and start to walk forward to peek inside of them. In the first one, you see a few rocks and wood chippings, and under a heat lamp you see a resting corn snake. It looked huge at your size, and also beautiful, with its red scales with a black outlined oval pattern repeating itself on its back. The next tank had a layout with many sticks, leaves, and things to climb on. In it, you can see an iguana, which was a bit bigger than the snake. It had greenish leathery skin and you couldn't help but be surprised as it walked forward in its tank to get a better look at you.

You think about what to do for a bit and decide..
1542.title: Turn to observe the other cages and tanks.

15422.content:
As you approach the iguana tank, the iguana wastes no time welcoming you into its home; it's large, sticky tongue strikes you right in your chest, and before you know it, you're inside it's slimy mouth. Forced to choke on its hot breath, the only solace you have is that you are quickly swallowed and sent right to its plushy stomach, which is somehow even hotter.

On the outside of the iguana, minor activity is spotted, representing your futile efforts to punch your way out of its stomach.
15422.title: Go over to the iguana tank.

15423.content: you keep walking until you find the center row of cages
15423.title: Look at more animals.

154232.content: How about one of these?
154232.title: (readers choice)

155.title: any where but to last set.

15511.content: You wake up like any other morning in a uncomfortable position. You attempt to move your limbs but can't except for you head. You can see only white strings around you similar to webbing. As you are looking around you see a fly that has been wrapped up except for its face. You decide your best course of action is to not panic because the spider could come.So you are in a spider web and you are a mere 2 inches tall. Before you proceed you to think of a way out where are you.
15511.title: What kind or where?

choices: The dragon spots you and begins to land...
1552.content:
Yawning, you wake up and stretch your arms. You open your eyes and stare at your giant leaf bed. ...wait. Giant leaf? You quickly stand up and glance around frantically. You appear to be in a forest; however, either everything has become huge or you have become small. Every aspect, trees, leaves, rocks, streams, is giant! This must be a dream. There's no earthly way you could shrink and be transported into the forest while you were sleeping. You then find out that this isn't Earth, because you suddenly notice a dragon fly over the top of the forest.

What happens?
1552.title: In another world...

15521.content:
Your heart sinks as the titanic beast performs a majestic swoop towards you - Unfortunately, your too frightened to even flinch.

-Within' seconds the dragon lands just feet away from you, saliva dripping from it's hungry maw.. The creature is olive green in colour, with thick armoured scales. A crest of horns runs down the back of it's spine, ending at the tip of it's snake-like tail. But, one of the most fearsome features of the beast are it's teeth..

You begin to make a break for it, but the dragon is MUCH faster than you. You soon find yourself held in it's deadly claws..
15521.title: In the dragons grip..

155211.content:
You begin to struggle pathetically as the dragon raises you to it's snout. You fortunately manage you release your left leg and with your remaining strength you kick out, hoping to injure the beast.

-Your pitiful kicks are barely noticed as the dragon opens it's cavernous jaws. You scream as a huge long tongue
slips out from it's mouth, glossy with sticky saliva..

The dragon begins to taste your body with it's giant tongue, you shriek in disgust as it travels over your face, soaking it and leaving you covered in the thick saliva.

It withdraws it's tongue and maneuvers you closer to it's hungrily waiting mouth, it's muscular throat opening wide to reveal a long gullet which you will soon be traveling down.
155211.title: Prepare to get eaten..

1552111.content: You slip down the great creature's throat and into it's stomach. There is no possible escape. The dragon licks his lips and notices how great you tasted. You will be here for a while, but at least you fed the dragon as your last act.
1552111.title: In the dragon's belly

15522.content: Yeah think about yourm a kid who can run about 10 mph, and your shrunk or something so its more like 1 mph, and it's a dragon who flies at about 60 mph. So lets skip to the end of the amazingly short chase scene. "AHHHHH!!!!!" you scream as the dragon grabs in its jaws and flies off swallowing you whole in the process.
15522.title: Yeah like that'll help

choices: Down the plyorvic valve (to the intestines).
155222.content:
You sit in the cavernous organ for quite some time, finding the rocking motion of the dragon's flight quite soothing. You may have fallen asleep under a different circumstance.
You decide to try and escape, so which way to you go?
155222.title: Inside the Belly

choices: You brush it a little with your shoulder.
You manage to slip by without making contact.
1552221.content:
Shivering in fright and anticipation, you stand up and walk over to the huge throat muscle. You notice a gap, just barely big enough for you to fit in without prying too much. Without another thought, you climb in.

The fact that the huge beast was flying paralell to the ground made your trip going back up much easier for you. On your hands and knees, crawling, you finally managed to scramble almost up to the mouth of the dragon. All you had to worry about now was touching the uvula and causing the creature to swallow, undoing all your work. You weren't sure you had enough strength to crawl back up again.

Very slowly, you inch forward, closer to the uvula..
1552221.title: Escape!

choices: The Dragon 'Holds onto you' as it continues flying
The Dragon puts you Onto its back
15522211.content:
You accidentally brush the uvula! But, instead of baing re-swallowed, you hear a gagging sound. That's when you remember: the uvula controls the gag reflex, so instead of swallowing you, the dragon's going to.. OH CRAP!
I have good news and bad news. The good news is: you're not gonna die! The bad news is: You're not gonna die because the dragon caught you! This could be bad...
15522211.title: Remembering too Late

choices: Just don't screw this up. SIt tight until you can escape.
15522212.content:
Sucking in your chest and bellying down into the tongue, you slide by. With a sigh of relief, you're back in the mouth. Whew.

Well, you might be here a while. What to do?
15522212.title: You made it!

155222121.content:
You decided it'd be fun to kill some time by playing around in here. Heading to the tip of the tongue, you start to massage and pet it with your hands. The tongue wriggles a bit, enjoying your taste.

Suddenly, it surges forward, unbalancing you. You land face down in slippery, sticky, warm saliva. It then folds back on itself, rubbing you. You try and get out. You can feel the dragon purring in pleasure at your taste and movement.
155222121.title: Uh-oh.

choices: You might want to get comfortable
1552222.content: As you enter the dragon's intestines, you notice that the swaying motion you had grown accostummed to has stopped. You hesitate for a moment, wondering what happened. Not your brst idea, as it turned out. Still wondering what's going on, you accidentally slip on some 'bodily' juices and quickly slide through not just the one intestine, but both!! There's a soft 'Thud!' as you land the dragon's cavernous bowels.
1552222.title: The 'Natural' Exit

15522221.content:
You feel a strang pushing sensation. You suddenly realize that the bowels (which you're in) are emptying. This could be a problem. Unfortunately, by the time you finished reading it was too late to do anything about your current situation. *Plop*
"CENSORED" (we're sorry but you're most recent remark has been censored due to an imense violation of my consciense) The dragon turns to look at you. "Hello my little morsel. Did you enjoy your 'ride'?" The dragon(or now I guess dragoness) says with a very feminine voice, almost like bells.
15522221.title: *plop* (the rest of this title has been censored)

155222211.content:
You look at her, your eye's going wide, "WTF you can talk!" you yell at her.
"Well is that not obvious?" she said with a little giggle, "Now how about you answer my question, little morsel".
"Well I..."
155222211.title: WTF SHE CAN TALK

choices: Next Morning (She  does want to be friends
Next Morning (She wants you... as a pet!)
155222212.content: "Err.. It was alright, but that last part I would rather have avoided." you say while getting up. The dragoness giggles, then reaches out a claw (yes one claw singular, I doubt you could handle her entire foot) "I don't think we've been properly introduced. My name is Volcana." (thant's Volcano except with a short a on the end instead of a long o) You tell her your name and then shake her claw. "Its getting dark out, you should get some sleep." Volcana says before leading you into the cave that you are now in. She lays down and uses her tail to push you next to her gut. She's comfortably warm to lay next to, and you fall asleep quickly.
155222212.title: So now she wants To be Friends?

choices: She's grown enough to match your growth
1552222121.content: When you wake up, the first you notice is that Volcana seems to be gone, quickly followed by the fact that the ceiling seems to be closer. You stand up "YES!" you cry aloud. You were normal sized again! Suddenly, you hear wingbeats and a familiar voice, "I'm back. Are you awake yet sleepy head?" Volcana's back (obviously) but she's gotten bigger.
1552222121.title: Meeting Her Family

15522221211.content: Volcana must have noticed that you're staring at her because she giggle and says, "Don't you know that dragons have growth spurts?" You're too stunned to talk, so you just shake your head. "Oh well, it doesn't matter. You know now, buddy." Did just call you buddy? "Yeah I did." Holy F*** she can read your mind! "Yes I can, and I didn't appreciate the way you 'worded' that." You hear a roar in the distance. "That must be my dad! Come on I'll show you to him!" Volcana stated, before you could she scooped you up in her mouth (UGH your inside her again) and took off. Some time later, (it felt like forever but was propably only a few hours) Volcana lands and lets you out of her mouth. The first thing you see upon 'exiting' is a very large (even compared to Volcana) red dragon! Your thought? Something along the lines of: HOLY MOTHER OF F***! Apparently all dragons can read minds as the larger dragon gets a chuckle out of that. "Hi dad! This is my new friend! He doesn't have anywhere to go so can he stay with us, please?" Volcana's 'dad' responds by sniffing you a few before saying, " Well, he looks alright. And I kind of like him so.. sure." Volcana jumps for joy, literally. The shock wave caused by this knocks you on your behind. "Your love it here!" she exclaims, "Just wait until you meet the rest of my family!" The rest?
15522221211.title: Your not the Only One Who's Grown

info.brief_description: You are shrunk by some weird unknown force and now various animals want to eat you!
info.description:
This is my frist writing.com story.
You are shrunk by some weird force and now are under attack by various animals that want to eat you!
These animal can be real, furry, or off video games, the web, and tv.
This is made for teens/adults so try and keep any ADULT content to a minimum.

The Rules for Posting Are:
-Little or No ADULT content please. (keep this like a PG-13 movie)
-Soft vore only.
-No human vore. (the prey can be human, the pred can't.)
-No nonsense. (ex. This story is a pile of *^&^$. join LoSeR.com because you are one if you read this story.)XD
-Spelling and grammar rules are light. (my spelling/grammar is not so good anyways.)
-Your entries may get edited due to bad spelling/grammar, lack of description, or other mistakes. Entries will still include your base entry and credit still goes to you.
-Have a lot of fun.
-No hate mail/entires. (just don't do it)
info.pretty_title: You V.S. the giant hungry animals!
